title: 'You'd be obliterated!' Labour MP suffers GB News grilling after declaring 'united support' for Keir Starmer after crunch meeting
tags: Ex-Labour adviser tells Keir Starmer WHEN he should resign as pressure mounts on PM;Nigel Farage says Keir Starmer will be gone by end of the month as he sticks boot in: ‘Game’s up!’;WATCH: Reform UK supporters ERUPT in applause for GB News's Katherine Forster;The GB News Editorial Charter
